Articles.Content: I downloaded the KSP Making History Expansion add-on. I was wondering how I would be able to use the Space race spacecraft and fly them?
You need to build them and fly them, using the parts provided in the DLC.
In addition to building them yourself, you can also try flying replicas that other people have built. Since you have the expansion, you can download and run missions like this one.
They are parts like any others. Did you have specific questions about them?
